messages.title: Is it TIME TO SCRAP TRIDENT?
messages.content: One of the issues that may appear to have been decided by the outcome of the General Election is whether or not to renew Britain’s military nuclear capacity – Trident.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Against the renewal of Trident, Nick Perry has made public his opposition to Trident renewal.

mentions.candidate: Nick Perry made public his opposition to Trident renewal.

issues.economy: Austerity-strapped economy where the costs can only be expected to rise.

images.caption: Forum on Trident Renewal at White Rock Hotel

leaflet.additionalNotes: Debate on Trident renewal, questioning the monetary costs and the strategic need. Public meeting with speaker Toby Fenwick, expected to be controversial.
